data.title: Please recommend me some Cole Porter...
data.meta_description:
So I've been wanting to look into the man's music, and naturally there seems to be quite a few options out there.
I looked over Amazon results and...
data.text:
Of the ones I have, I enjoy these the most.

1. All of You - Annie Ross/Gerry Mulligan

2. Always True to You in My Fashion - Peggy Lee/George Shearing

3. Anything Goes - Tony Bennett/Count Basie

4. Begin the Beguine - Gordon McRae

5. Blow, Gabriel, Blow - Martha Tilton (previously unreleased)

6. Ev'ry Time We Say Goodbye - June Christy/Stan Kenton

7. From Now On - Peggy Lee

8. I Get a Kick Out of You - Chris Connor/Stan Kenton (previously unreleased)

9. I Happen to Like New York - Judy Garland

10. In the Still of the Night - Helen O'Connell

11. It's All Right With Me - Dinah Shore/Red Norvo Quintet

12. I've Got You Under My Skin - Louis Prima/Keely Smith

13. Just One of Those Things - Nat "King" Cole

14. Looking at You - Liza Minnelli

15. Miss Otis Regrets (She's Unable to Lunch Today) - Francis Faye

16. So in Love - John Raitt

17. True Love - Dean Martin/Nelson Riddle

18. What Is This Thing Called Love - Keely Smith/Nelson Riddle

19. Why Shouldn't I? - Margaret Whiting

20. Wunderbar - Jo Stafford/Gordon McRae/Paul Weston

21. You'd Be So Nice to Come Home To - Nancy Wilson

22. You're the Top - Jean Turner/Stan Kenton

23. Let's Do It (Let's Fall in Love) - Trudy Richards/Billy May

24. Get Out of Town - Jeri Southern/Billy May

25. You Do Something to Me - The Andrews Sisters/Billy May
